participant_abstract.sent: The meeting went over quite smoothly, expecially considering the relative amount of time each of us had spent with each other and in our positions.
The project manager was able to run the meeting effectively and some good ideas were brought forward.
Each of the individuals I believe were generally satisfied with the meeting and as interface designer I feel confident in the direction we are heading in.

participant_actions.sent: Marketing - work out what kind of market we are targeting.
Perhaps start considering market information, saturation, needs, etc.. Manager - keep the team on track.
Ensure next meeting is productive and ready to be executed effectively.
Industrial Designer - work out how device will work, what functions are required, etc...
User Interface Designer - work out how the user will work the device, and give it some distinct features as a selling point.

participant_decisions.sent: come up with practical soloutions to creating, designing, and marketing our product.
designers would work together at some point to coordinate design.
we would keep in mind in our designs what kind of group we are marketing towards.
we must seek to have a final production cost of ?12.50.
